author: trimetilo
content:
<@399309815517544451> You are right, I meant the process was hung (no crash). We are running the same docker images that are defined in the 4844-testnet repo (https://github.com/ethpandaops/4844-testnet/blob/master/kubernetes/devnet-4/node-001/values.yaml)

`ethpandaops/geth:mdehoog-eip4844-20d3ce8` and `ethpandaops/prysm:eip4844-1-08a910e`

prysm was not syncing and that was the last error shown. The node had been out of sync for like 20 hours until we realized. It worked fine again after restart.
